s2283: Year 18: Crown Prince Ji and younger brother Shou contended and died.
s2300: Year 7: The duke was licentious with Cai; Cai killed the duke.
s2310: Year 32: Xi Gong commanded Wu Zhi's rank to be the same as the crown prince.
s2328: Year 6: The three fathers killed Chu Zi and established his elder brother as Wu Gong.
s2335: Year 3: The feudal lords attacked us, in revenge for Song.
s2341: Year 15: The Heavenly King demanded chariots; it was not ritual.
s2347: Year 3: Shuo fled to Qi; established Qian Mu.
s2351: Year 4: Ji Zhong established Hu; the duke went into exile at Li.
s2357: Year 16: The duke met with Cao to plan attacking Zheng.
s2367: Zheng Zhao Gong Hu, first year. Hu's mother was a Deng woman; Ji Zhong took her.
s2372: Year 2: Had a younger brother Ke.
s2373: Year 17: Solar eclipse; the day was not recorded; the officials lost it.
s2383: Year 2: Qu Mi killed Zhao Gong.
s2389: Year 18: The duke and the lady went to Qi; the Qi duke seduced her and sent Peng Sheng to kill the duke on the chariot.
s2390: Year 4: Killed Lu Huan Gong and executed Peng Sheng.
s2399: Zheng Zi Mian, first year. Qi killed Zi Mian; Zhao Gong's younger brother.
s2404: Year 4: Zhou Gong wanted to kill the king and establish Zi Ke; the king executed Zhou Gong; Ke fled to Yan.
s2415: Zheng Zi Ying, first year. Zi Mian's younger brother.
s2454: Year 8: Attacked Ji and destroyed its capital cities.
s2457: Year 51: The king attacked; Sui reported that the lady's heart moved; the king died in the army.
s2469: Year 5: Together with Qi attacked Wei and installed Hui Gong.
s2489: Year 2: Attacked Shen, passed Deng; Deng's nephew said Chu could be taken; Deng Hou did not allow it.
s2501: Year 7: Stars fell like rain, together with the rain.
s2507: Year 10: Qi established Hui Gong; Qian Mu fled to Zhou.
s2966: Year 28: Built Chu Qiu for Wei. Saved from Rong Di attacks.
s2967: Year 19: Xun Xi used currency to borrow passage through Yu to attack Guo, destroyed Xia Yang.
s2971: Year 2: Qi Huan Gong led the feudal lords to build Chu Qiu for us.
s2982: Year 29: Together with Cai Ji in the same boat, rocked the duke; the duke was angry and returned Cai Ji.
s2989: Year 18: Because of the woman's matter, Qi attacked us.
s2998: Year 30: Led the feudal lords to attack Cai; Cai collapsed, then attacked Chu and demanded tribute of bundled mugwort.
s2999: Year 21: Shen Sheng killed himself because of Li Ji's slander. Chong Er fled to Pu; Yi Wu fled to Qu.
s3000: Year 4: Welcomed the bride from Jin.
s3001: Year 16: Qi attacked us, reached Xing, sent Qu Wan to make alliance.
